org.apache.lucene.search
Interface ExtendedFieldCache

All Superinterfaces:
FieldCache
Deprecated. Use FieldCache, this will be removed in Lucene 3.0 

public interface ExtendedFieldCache
extends FieldCache

This interface is obsolete, use FieldCache instead.
